person.headline: NLP / GenAI Researcher & Applied AI Engineer

profile: Data Scientist and AI Engineer specialized in NLP and GenAI. I bridge applied research (NAACL'25, SEPLN'23) with industry delivery, leading Fortune 500 projects and owning end-to-end data/AI pipelines (ingestion, preprocessing, model tuning, deployment). Proficient in GenAI technologies, classic ML and MLOps.

projects.title: An LLM-Based Approach for Insight Generation
projects.one_liner: Published paper and industrially deployed agent-based system using LLMs to generate analytical insights from relational datasets.
highlights: Main-author paper published on NAACL 2025 and industrially deployed on scale for multiple Fortune 500 companies.
Agentic system for insight generation over relational data.
Deployed to production and reduced production pipeline costs by 99.6%.

projects.title: Competitive Intelligence Platform
projects.one_liner: End-to-end intelligence platform covering P&L forecasting, market insights, and asset-buyer recommendations.
highlights: Industrially deployed for multiple fortune 500 companies.
Multi-module intelligence app (P&L forecasting, market insights, asset-buyer recommendations).
Coordination and mentoring of an intern, presentation for internal and external C-level stakeholders.
Designed DB schema and orchestration to reduce runtime from ~60 minutes to under 1 minute.

projects.title: Music Data Extraction and Matching
projects.one_liner: Large-scale LLM document extraction from music legal contracts with cross-source entity matching over relational DBs.
highlights: Industrially deployed for a 'Big Three' Music Record company.
Data modelling and massive data extraction over a massive number of artist contracts.
Linking across multiple sources on fuzzy multi-granular entities.

projects.title: WidAug: Knowledge-Graph Synthetic Data for NER
projects.one_liner: Synthetic data generation from knowledge graphs to improve low-resource NER performance.
highlights: Co-authored paper published on SEPLN 2023.
KG-based synthetic data generation to improve low-resource NER.
Boosted F1 by ~20% for low-resource NER settings.

projects.title: StopSlop
projects.one_liner: Chrome extension that flags low-quality/slop websites using an ultra-lightweight (<10KB) on-device classifier.
highlights: Built a custom slop vs non-slop dataset by scraping websites by domain.
Implemented a custom NumPy model (fasttext vocabulary + custom features linear classifier).
Used DL training techniques (lasso loss, dropout, gradient clipping).
Heavy feature prunning, numerical optimization and retraining for ultra-light performance.
Shipped the full inference pipeline in JavaScript for a Chrome extension

projects.title: MiniSnowflake
projects.one_liner: Lightweight analytical SQL engine with sharded storage and map-reduce query execution.
highlights: Custom analytical SQL engine with sharded storage using map-reduce
Custom parser, planner, and orchestrator (round-robin scheduler)
DuckDB workers for local execution
FastAPI coordinator with Uvicorn

projects.title: MapReduce Document Processing
projects.one_liner: Redesigned document-processing from RAG-style flow to a MapReduce architecture for reliability and scalability.
highlights: Replaced a RAG-based approach with a MapReduce-style design to improve reliability and scalability of document processing.
Hardened pipeline execution for large document volumes and repeatable processing runs.
Presentation to relevant C-level stakeholders.

projects.title: SmarTerp
projects.one_liner: Joint NER and machine translation system optimized for low-latency applications and cost efficiency.
highlights: Built a combined NER and machine translation system targeting low-latency application requirements.
Reduced operating costs by ~40%.

bullets: Delivered GenAI features for Fortune 500 clients: large-scale LLM document extraction for legal contracts and entity matching across data sources.
Designed procurement document-processing pipelines, replacing RAG approaches with a MapReduce design that improved reliability and scalability.

Led development of a Competitive Intelligence app (P&L forecasting, market insights, asset-buy recommendations); database and pipelines design and orchestration, reducing runtime from 60 minutes to under 1 minute.
Mentored an intern, coordinated sprints and code reviews, and regularly presented progress to C-level stakeholders.
Main author of NAACL 2025 paper on using agent-based systems to generate insights from relational databases; deployed to production and reduced operational costs by 99.6% on a production pipeline.
Co-authored synthetic data generation from KG data (WidAug), boosting F1 by 20% for low-resource NER.
Developed a combined NER + machine translation system for low-latency applications, reducing costs by 40%.

education.degree: BSc in Mathematics and Computer Science

publications.title: An LLM-Based Approach for Insight Generation in Data Analysis
Widaug. Data augmentation for named entity recognition using Wikidata
